descriptionHtml:
[center][url=http://www.skyrimgems.com][img]http://SkyrimGEMS.com/images/badge_featured.png[/img][/url][/center]

============================== 

THE ARENA III 

============================== 

NOW FEATURED ON SKYRIM GEMS!!

This mod gives you a fully functional, detailed, lore and roleplay friendly arena.It is built by Skyrim players, for skyrim players. It acts as a pseudo tournament ring where Players can fight monsters or watch as they fight each other to the death, killing what is left of them with a simple button. With epic cinematics and even more features coming soon, this mod is what you\'ve been longing since Oblivion.

THE ARENA IS IN BLEAKWIND BASIN.
*****LOOKING FOR A CODER PLEASE ADD ME TO YOUR FRIENDS LIST IF YOU ARE INTERESTED.*****
**The Steam Workshop version is much more stable. If you are having problems with this one try that out.**
----------------------------
V3.2:
Finally fixed priest of perytrite bug.
-----------------------------
V3.1:
-Removed buggy spawners.
-Made the gate buttons bigger.
-Added a description note at the front of the arena that guides you around.
-Fixed areas that got players stuck.
-Fixed clone guards.

---------

V3.0 IS OUT WITH COMPLETELY GAME CHANGING FEATURES:

-Completely new arena that is 15X bigger than the old one!
- Coliseum style seats!
-Around 7(!!!) new waves of enemies making a total of 13 waves! They can also be combined!
-Living,sleeping,training and torture rooms for gladiators!
-Enemies now spawn in their Closed stations that can be opened or closed by the player!

-------------------

Features:

-Constantly updated.
-Fully functional.
-Chains that allow you to spawn different waves of mobs which gradually get more and more difficult! They even fight each other!
-Living,sleeping,training and torture rooms for gladiators!
-Lore and roleplay friendly.
-Seating area for pedestrians.
-A campsite for the player to sleep in.
-Flat but detailed warzone that is great for balancing the combat.
-Detailed spectator area for the jarl or you.
-Beautifully decorated for war with spikes,barricades, banners.
-The ability to lay traps around the Arena.
-A prison.
-Vultures flying over the arena, waiting for flesh.
-Easy to reach.
-A crafting dungeon.
-Great for both Player VS. AI and AI VS. AI

----------------------
Spawning System
----------------------
Please note that some of the chains are not working right now.
From right to left:

Chain One: 
2 Bears 
2 Wolves 

Chain Two:
3 Bandit Thugs 
2 Bandit Marauders 

Chain Three: 
2 Frost Trolls 
1 Cave Bear 

Chain Four: 
10 Frostbite Spiders

Chain Five: 
1 Dwarven Centurion 

Chain Six: 
2 Giants

Chain 7:
2 dwarven spider workers and 1 dwarven sphere

Chain 9:
4 falmers

Chain 10:
2 daedras

Chain 11:
-1 Dragon priest

Chain 12:
-1 skeleton dragon

Chain 13:
-5 imperial soldiers (for fight with stormcloaks)

Chain 14:
-5 stormcloak soldiers (for fight with imperials) 
-----------------
V2.0:
-Chains that allow you to spawn different waves of enemies which gradually get more and more difficult! They even fight each other!
-Arena is 1.5x bigger now.
-Lots of bug fixes and new visual details.
-6 different waves which can be combined for huge and customized wars!

New in Version 1.3:
-Added a camp near the arena,where the fighters can sleep.
-Added trees so that the arena isnt out in the open. 

New in Version 1.2:

Lots of new design features like statues and rubbles.It looks much better now.Also added guards.

New in Version 1.1:
Added a crafting area with an alchemy station, grindwheel and anvil.
-----------------


Upcoming Features:
-Cinematics.
-Coliseum style completely new arena. (DONE)
-A possible Barbarian outpost or small settlement around the arena where the player
can place bets and talk to other npc\'s.
-Spectating ai that cheers.
-Betting.
-Systematic wave system (DONE)
-Buttons that will spawn enemies.(DONE)
-More trap options.
-Dungeons and rooms That holds Enemies(or you) before the show.(DONE)
-Gladiator style levers that will allow you to kill the victims or let them live another day. It\'s up to you!(DONE)
-A healer that will heal the survivors after the battle.
-A merchant so that you can sell the items of the fallen enemies.(Done)
===========================================
CREDITS

SavaGhost
--
DA_HAX0R for community support, beta testing and lots more. Thanks for being a friend!
--
Nyxeka for coding help.
--
videogamer717 for beta testing.
--
Voreav, for his great friendship.
===========================================
